item.title: CVE-2021-45029|2024-08-04T04:32:13.478Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20shenyu%20%28incubating%29
item.description: Groovy Code Injection & SpEL Injection which lead to Remote Code Execution. This issue affected Apache ShenYu 2.4.0 and 2.4.1.
